instructions.en: Take exit 4A on the left towards Destination 1
instructions.es: Ve cuesta abajo en la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Prendre la sortie à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Ambil jalan melandai di sebelah kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.nl: Neem de afrit links richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Take exit 4A on the left towards Destination 1
instructions.ru: Поверните на левый съезд в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sv: Ta avfartsrampen till vänster mot Destination 1
instructions.vi: Đi theo lối ra 4A bên trái về hướng Destination 1
